Text:
Without  a doubt  the most realistic sitcom of spa life in a comedy form .... right down to the comedy polish worker (of course generally there are about 30 in an average uk hotel even in the wilds).

The boss was an amazing likeness to a career minded woman who by the time she gets to the top has been twisted by years of working in a female orientated spa environment .. with no men for years ...

Just a pity all the eps arent on here. ..see EZTV
